attributes.action: RBS chief should give up bonus
attributes.additional_details: R.B.S  and other bank bosses have been given huge bonuses once again whilst the rest of the country is suffering and the govement are making cuts to vital benefits and services. This is certainly not a case of "we are all in this together"If you think that the goverment should CAP the huge bonuses that bank bosses are recieving whilst we the public are sacrificing things then please sign this petition many thanks
